-- | postgresql backend for sql-simple
--   
--   postgresql backend for sql-simple
@package sql-simple-postgresql
@version 0.3.0

module Database.Sql.Simple.PostgreSQL
data PostgreSQL
PostgreSQL :: Connection -> PostgreSQL
postgreSQL :: Proxy '[PostgreSQL]
psql :: Proxy '[PostgreSQL]
instance Typeable PostgreSQL
instance Eq (ConnectInfo PostgreSQL)
instance Read (ConnectInfo PostgreSQL)
instance Show (ConnectInfo PostgreSQL)
instance Default (ConnectInfo PostgreSQL)
instance Transaction PostgreSQL
instance Backend PostgreSQL
instance (FromRow a, FromRow b) => FromRow (a :. b)
instance (ToRow a, ToRow b) => ToRow (a :. b)
instance FromField a => FromRow (Only a)
instance ToField a => ToRow (Only a)
